00347     class Ctx {
00348     public:
00349         Ctx();
00350         ~Ctx();
00352         I32 arg_len() {
00353             return (I32)(PL_stack_sp - mark);
00354         }
00356         Scalar* arg(int n) {
00357             Scalar*s = new Scalar(fetch_stack(n));
00358             this->register_allocated(s);
00359             return s;
00360         }
00362         void ret(Scalar s) {
00363             this->ret(0, &s);
00364         }
00365         void ret(Scalar* s) {
00366             this->ret(0, s);
00367         }
00368         void ret(int n, Scalar* s) {
00369             this->ret(n, s ? s->serialize() : &PL_sv_undef);
00370         }
00371         void ret(int n, SV* s) {
00372             PL_stack_base[ax + n] = s;
00373         }
00375         bool wantarray() {
00376             return GIMME_V & G_ARRAY ? true : false;
00377         }
00379         void return_multi(std::vector<Scalar*>& vec) {
00380             if (vec.size() != 0) {
00381                 SV** sp = PL_stack_sp;
00382                 if ((unsigned int)(PL_stack_max - sp) < vec.size()) {
00383                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, vec.size());
00384                 }
00385 
00386                 std::vector<Scalar*>::iterator iter;
00387                 for (iter = vec.begin(); iter != vec.end(); iter++) {
00388                     PL_stack_base[ax++] = *iter ? (*iter)->serialize() : &PL_sv_undef;
00389                 }
00390                 ax--;
00391             } else {
00392                 this->return_undef();
00393             }
00394         }
00396         void return_true() {
00397             this->ret(0, &PL_sv_yes);
00398         }
00400         void return_undef() {
00401             this->ret(0, &PL_sv_undef);
00402         }
00408         void register_allocated(Value* v) {
00409             allocated.push_back(v);
00410         }
00411     protected:
00416         SV* fetch_stack(int n) {
00417             return PL_stack_base[this->ax + n];
00418         }
00419         I32 ax;
00420         SV ** mark;
00421         std::vector<Value*> allocated;
00422     };
00423     std::vector<Ctx*> ctxstack;
00424     Ctx::Ctx() {
00425         // same as dAXMARK
00426         this->ax = *PL_markstack_ptr + 1;
00427         --PL_markstack_ptr;
00428         this->mark = PL_stack_base + ax - 1;
00429 
00430         ctxstack.push_back(this);
00431     }
00432     Ctx::~Ctx() {
00433         std::vector<Value*>::iterator iter;
00434         for (iter = allocated.begin(); iter != allocated.end(); iter++) {
00435             delete *iter;
00436         }
00437 
00438         PL_stack_sp = PL_stack_base + ax;
00439 
00440         ctxstack.pop_back();
00441     }

00446     class CurCtx {
00447     public:
00448         static Ctx * get() {
00449             return ctxstack[ctxstack.size()-1];
00450         }

00459     Reference * Hash::fetch(const char* key) {
00460         // SV**    hv_fetch(HV* tb, const char* key, I32 klen, I32 lval)
00461         SV ** v = hv_fetch((HV*)this->val, key, strlen(key), 0);
00462         if (v) {
00463             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00464             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00465             return ref;
00466         } else {
00467             return NULL;
00468         }
00469     }

00472         if (v) {

00474             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00475             return ref;

00477             return NULL;

00492     Scalar * Array::store(I32 key, Scalar* _v) {
00493         _v->refcnt_inc();
00494         SV** v = av_store((AV*)this->val, key, _v->val);
00495         if (v) {
00496             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00497             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00498             return ref;
00499         } else {
00500             return NULL;
00501         }

00518             newXS((pkg + "::" + name).c_str(), func, file);
00519         }

00525             newCONSTSUB(stash, name, val);
00526         }

00541     class BootstrapCtx : public Ctx {
00542     public:
00543         BootstrapCtx() : Ctx() {
00544             xs_version_bootcheck();
00545         }
00546         ~BootstrapCtx() {
00547             PL_stack_base[this->ax] = &PL_sv_yes;
00548             PL_stack_sp = PL_stack_base + this->ax;
00549         }
00550     protected:
00551         // XS_VERSION_BOOTCHECK
00552         void xs_version_bootcheck() {
00553             SV *_sv;
00554             const char *vn = NULL, *module = SvPV_nolen_const(ST(0));
00555             if (this->arg_len() >= 2) {
00556                 /* version supplied as bootstrap arg */
00557                 _sv = PL_stack_base[ax+1];
00558             } else {
00559                 /* XXX GV_ADDWARN */
00560                 _sv = get_sv(Perl_form(aTHX_ "%s::%s", module,
00561                         vn = "XS_VERSION"), FALSE);
00562                 if (!_sv || !SvOK(_sv))
00563                 _sv = get_sv(Perl_form(aTHX_ "%s::%s", module,
00564                             vn = "VERSION"), FALSE);
00565             }
00566             if (_sv) {
00567                 SV *xssv = Perl_newSVpv(aTHX_ XS_VERSION, 0);
00568                 xssv = new_version(xssv);
00569                 if ( !sv_derived_from(_sv, "version") ) {
00570                     _sv = new_version(_sv);
00571                 }
00572                 if ( vcmp(_sv,xssv) ) {
00573                     Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s object version %"SVf" does not match %s%s%s%s %"SVf,
00574                         module, SVfARG(vstringify(xssv)),
00575                         vn ? "$" : "", vn ? module : "", vn ? "::" : "",
00576                         vn ? vn : "bootstrap parameter", SVfARG(vstringify(_sv)));
00577                 }
00578             }
00579         }
00580     };

00593     class Pointer : public Scalar {
00594     public:
00595         Pointer(SV* s) : Scalar(s) { }
00597         Pointer(void* _ptr, const char* klass) : Scalar(sv_newmortal()) {
00598             if (_ptr == NULL) {
00599                 sv_setsv(this->val, &PL_sv_undef);
00600             } else {
00601                 sv_setref_pv(this->val, klass, _ptr);
00602             }
00603         }
00604 
00608         template <class T>
00609         T* extract() {
00610             return INT2PTR(T *, SvROK(this->val) ? SvIV(SvRV(this->val)) : SvIV(this->val));
00611         }
00612     };

00617     class Perl {
00618     public:
00619         static void call(Code* code, U32 flags, Array * args, Array* retval) {
00620             SV **sp = PL_stack_sp;
00621 
00622             push_scope(); // ENTER
00623             save_int((int*)&PL_tmps_floor); // SAVETMPS
00624             PL_tmps_floor = PL_tmps_ix;
00625 
00626             if (++PL_markstack_ptr == PL_markstack_max) { // PUSHMARK(SP);
00627                 markstack_grow();
00628             }
00629             *PL_markstack_ptr = (I32)((sp) - PL_stack_base);
00630 
00631             std::vector<Scalar*>::iterator iter;
00632             for (int i =0; i < args->len()+1; i++) {
00633                 if (PL_stack_max - sp < 1) { // EXTEND()
00634                     // optimize?
00635                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, 1);
00636                 }
00637                 *++sp = args->pop()->val; // XPUSHs
00638             }
00639             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00640 
00641             int count = call_sv(code->val, flags);
00642 
00643             sp = PL_stack_sp; // SPAGAIN
00644 
00645             for (int i=0; i<count; i++) {
00646                 Scalar * s = new Scalar(*sp--);
00647                 CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00648                 retval->store(i, s);
00649             }
00650 
00651             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00652             if (PL_tmps_ix > PL_tmps_floor) { // FREETMPS
00653                 free_tmps();
00654             }
00655             pop_scope(); // LEAVE
00656         }
00657         // static Hash* get_stash(Str* name);
00658 //      template<class U>
00659 //      static void* alloc(int size) {
00660 //          void *buf;
00661 //          Newx(buf, size, U);
00662 //          return buf;
00663 //      }
00664     };

00666     Reference * Value::reference() {
00667         return Reference::new_inc(this->val);
00668     }

00670     Str* Scalar::as_str() {
00671         if (SvPOK(this->val)) {
00672             Str * s = new Str(this->val);
00673             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00674             return s;
00675         } else {
00676             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a string",
00677                 "Devel::BindPP",
00678                 "sv");
00679         }
00680     }

00682         if (SvROK(this->val)) {

00745     Hash * Reference::as_hash() {
00746         if (SvROK(this->val) && SvTYPE(SvRV(this->val))==SVt_PVHV) {
00747             HV* h = (HV*)SvRV(this->val);
00748             Hash * hobj = new Hash(h);
00749             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(hobj);
00750             return hobj;
00751         } else {
00752             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a hash reference",
00753                 "Devel::BindPP",
00754                 "hv");
00755         }
00756     }
00757     Array * Reference::as_array() {
00758         SV* v = this->val;
00759         if (SvROK(v) && SvTYPE(SvRV(v))==SVt_PVAV) {
00760             AV* a = (AV*)SvRV(v);
00761             Array * obj = new Array(a);
00762             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00763             return obj;
00764         } else {
00765             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00766                 "Devel::BindPP",
00767                 "av");
00768         }
00769     }
00770     Scalar * Reference::as_scalar() {
00771         SV* v = this->val;
00772         if (v && SvROK(v)) {
00773             SV* a = (SV*)SvRV(v);
00774             Scalar * obj = new Scalar(a);
00775             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00776             return obj;
00777         } else {
00778             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00779                 "Devel::BindPP",
00780                 "sv");
00781         }
00782     }
00783     Code * Reference::as_code() {
00784         SV* v = this->val;
00785         if (v && SvROK(v)) {
00786             SV* a = (SV*)SvRV(v);
00787             Code * obj = new Code(a);
00788             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00789             return obj;

00791             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00792                 "Devel::BindPP",

00797     Reference* Hash::del(const char*key, I32 klen) {
00798         Reference * ref = new Reference(hv_delete((HV*)this->val, key, klen, 0));
00799         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00800         return ref;
00801     }
00802     Reference* Hash::store(const char*key, I32 klen, Scalar*value) {
00803         value->refcnt_inc();
00804         SV ** s = hv_store((HV*)this->val, key, klen, value->val, 0);
00805         assert(s && SvROK(*s));
00806         Reference * ref = new Reference(*s);
00807         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00808         return ref;
00809     }

00812         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00813         return s;
00814     }
